comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: The caption joins the names of both boxers George Chip and "Fighting" Billy Murray.  This photo was taken before one of their two bouts in San Francisco (July 4, 1914 and September 30, 1914).  Chip would win by knockout on both occassions.

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the giving us their full names TVL 1970, I'll forward them to our catalogers.
